item.title: â˜• Introducing CafeMatrix
item.description:
The internet has undoubtedly anxiously awaited this next installment of my personal blog. Having revolutionized the spheres of architecture and education alike, what worlds are left to conquer? The answer is the flashy, cutthroat realm of restaurant ranking. A world that as of December 28, 2024, will never be the same. Introducing the new, paradigm-shifting CafeMatrix!

Note: please read the above paragraph with a heavy dose of sarcasm

The Problem
